phrases: Hey, all you viewers out there!
When you are watching Fairy Tail keep the room nice and bright,
and sit back from the screen, okay?
Previously on Fairy Tail!
Is Gray crying?
Gray's teacher, Ul, turned her own body into the ice that sealed Deliora.
He defeated his fellow student, Lyon, who was plotting on resurrecting the demon, but...
Deliora's been resurrected!
That is right, we can do it!
Let us go for even more who-knows-what!!
The door to mystery is right in front of us
The whole world's a wonderland
which we are already wondering!!!
This excitement gets my heart racing
It is wonderful!
Who am I, I wonder?
What is real, I wonder?
Why cannot I see tomorrow, I wonder?
The only part leveling up is my curiosity
We cannot just throw away our daily life together, right?
Tell me!
S. O. W.
Living itself will be our training!
So, we can make it!
Let us search for even more who-knows-what!
We cannot be satisfied with just the normal answers
This magical wonder life
Our future is wondering!!!
We will do our best living our life
the way we want to!
Let us wondering!!!
Finally, the time has come!
What the heck was that voice just now?
Or wait, was that even a voice?
Maybe it was your stomach growling, Lucy.
Even when I know you are joking, it still ticks me off.
Maybe it was this Deliora we are dealing with?
Wait, you do not mean...
That light!
It is the Moon Drip!
There it is again.
Lucy, you really should eat something.
How about I feed you to a rat?
Deliora may be able to roar, but the Moon Drip ceremony continues.
Which means its resurrection is not yet complete.
Come with me!
But Deliora's below us.
If we can break up the ceremony we can still halt the progress!
Hurry!
Burst!
Damn it!
I are not got time to waste...
I will finish you off quick!
I can manipulate this as well, my little Salamander...
Just try me!
It fixed itself again!
I can control the time of objects.
In other words, I can return the crystal to a time before it was broken.
Time?
I cannot believe that.
Time Ark is a magic that has been erased from history.
In other words, it is one of the Lost Magics.
Next, shall I progress the crystal's time into the future?
It will not work.
It stopped!
I can also stop its time, see.
But it looks like it will not work on humans.
Well, do not you have the sharp eyes?
It is accurate to say that it will not work on living creatures.
That is exactly why I cannot simply reverse time on the ice that is Ul.
Honestly, I do not get you.
So you are going to resurrect this thing only to let Lyon defeat it.
Lyon might be happy with that, but what is in it for his friends?
Who knows?
I only joined them all quite recently.
Then what about you?
What are you really after?
Oh my...
I cannot slip anything by you, can I?
Reitei-sama...
Or rather that spoiled brat could never defeat Deliora in the first place!
Wait, that is really dangerous!
So you would defeat it yourself?
Of course not.
I want to make it mine.
There exist techniques to control even immortal beasts.
It would be incredible for me to control such awesome power, do you not think?
How stupid.
Sorry I asked.
I wanted it to be a plan that is going to get me really fired up to stop!
You still do not understand.
There will always come a time when one needs power.
And when that time comes, I will believe in my own power, and the power of my friends...
The wizards of Fairy Tail!
That ego will lead to your destruction...
Ceiling, speed your time and crumble!
Each and every one of you are screwin' up this island for your own stupid reasons!
And I am not going to take it anymore!
Can those wild flames capture my Time Ark?
Time Ark, Time Pork, whatever!
Get the hell off this island!
Oh yeah, I can manipulate time, too.
The future!
One second from now I am going to blow you away!
All right, now the Moon Drip will stop!
Wow, he was doing it himself.
Too late!
The ceremony's already over!
Oh, no...
Oh, my...
Something truly fearsome has begun...
Chief, let us escape...
No!
No matter what happens, I will not leave this island!
Gray!
You are here?
Natsu!
We have got no choice now.
Let us destroy that thing!
It is impossible for you!
I will... defeat it...
Lyon...
In order to surpass Ul, I will be the one!
Looks way more impossible for you.
Stand back already!
Finally, we meet again... Deliora!
The most powerful wizard?
Around here that would be Ul.
Some years ago she secluded herself in the mountains in shock after she lost her daughter.
After that, no wizard's come close to Ul around here.
Ul, huh?
I wonder if she will take me on as an apprentice?
The one monster that Ul was not able to defeat...
I will... defeat it... with my own two hands!
You just picked up that brat, and now he is your apprentice?
How could you?
He said he wanted to learn magic.
Is it such a big deal?
Are not I enough as a replacement for your child?
Lyon.
I have never thought of you as a replacement for my daughter, not even once.
You are you.
My beloved apprentice.
I am... going to... surpass you!
Enough, Lyon.
Leave the rest to me.
I will seal Deliora!
Iced She Will!
Do not do it, Gray!
Do you know how long it took to melt that ice?
You are just repeating history!
One day I will melt it and challenge it again!
This is the only way.
Right now, this is the one thing that can stop it!
Natsu!
I will fight it.
Move, Natsu!
Do not get in my way!
I stopped you before'because I did not want you to die.
Maybe I did not get through to you?
If you are going to use that magic, then do it.
Natsu...
It is so loud!
My eardrums are going to burst!
Dodge it!
I am not going to give up'till the end!
What?
That was not me...
Y-You are kidding me...
It cannot be...
No way!
Deliora was already dead...
Look at that.
That is...
For 10 years, its life force has been sapped by Ul's ice...
All we saw was its last moment...
I cannot compare...
I can never surpass Ul!
Your teacher is pretty amazing.
I will seal your darkness.
Thank you very much...
Teacher...
Ul's ice was melted into water and flowed into the sea.
Even so, Ul is still alive.
That is what Gray said.
I think so as well.
Ul will watch over her two students from the ocean, forever.
She is telling them, do not fight any longer.
Oh yeah, it is finished!
Aye, sir!
Really, I was not sure what was going to happen there for a bit.
But Ul's really quite amazing!
Now we all managed to finish an S class quest!
Yippee!
Do you think we can go up to the second floor now?
Oh, crap!
We are going to be punished!
Before that, you have something to do, remember?
Was not the real point of this job to save the villagers who have been turned into demons?
The S class quest is not over yet.
But Deliora's dead, so will not this stop the curse?
No.
The source of that curse was not Deliora.
The tremendous magical power of the Moon Drip has caused disaster to befall the people.
The fact that Deliora has now crumbled would not have improved the situation.
Oh, no...
Then we will hurry up and cure'them!
Aye, sir!
How should we do that?
Hey, Lyon!
Let me tell you: I have no idea.
Say what?
What!
Wait, if you guys do not know, how else are we going to...
Three years ago when we came here, we knew there was a village on this island.
But we did not interfere with the villagers.
And they never came to see us even once.
Three years...
Not once?
And wait, the Moon Drip would have landed on the ruins every night.
So it is really strange that they would never come to investigate.
And there remain a number of questions about the effect the Moon Drip has on people's bodies.
Wait...
Are you trying to say that it is not your fault?
Think about it.
We have been under the same light for 3 years.
That is true!
You are right!
Be careful.
They are hiding something.
Well, anyway this is a job for you guild people.
Oh, I do not think so!
You are the one who destroyed the...
That is enough.
Sherry, and all the others are people who had their families taken from them by Deliora.
And that is why we all cooperated with Lyon.
We thought that if it is Lyon, he would be able to defeat Deliora.
He would finally be able to get revenge for us.
They have their own version of justice.
There is no need to criticize what they did in the past.
Let us go.
Go?
But how are we going to lift the curse?
Who knows...
What are you looking at?
Go join a guild somewhere.
You will gain friends and rivals, and I know you will find a new reason to live.
Pointless...
Just go already!
Huh?
It is deserted.
So everyone was here?
Because the village is gone.
But, why did everyone vanish?
Hey!
Anyway, I am going to get some medicine.
You have all returned?
There is a problem.
Please, hurry to the village!
What is this?
I thought the village was all messed up yesterday!
It is back the way it was.
How the heck?
Almost as if time has been reversed...
It is all fixed up now, so it would be better for you not to touch it.
Say what?!
What is that supposed to mean?!
Exactly what I said.
Wait, time?
Was it him?
Could not be...
Maybe he had a change of heart?
Whatever!
Aye, sir!
Huh, you okay with that?
Oh yeah, our bags!
I see Bobo's grave is back to normal too.
Thank goodness.
It was you all who returned the village to normal, yes?
Um, that is not...
I do appreciate it.
However, Wizards!
How long exactly until you destroy the moon, huh?
Destroying the moon will be a simple task.
Hey, did she just say that with a straight face?
Aye...
Well, that is Erza for you.
However, I have something I want to clarify first.
Will you gather everyone?
Let us review.
You all appeared in these forms after the moon turned purple.
Correct?
To be precice, it is only when that moon comes out do we look like this.
And considering what we have heard, this has been happening for the past 3 years, yes?
Yes.
It has probably been that long.
However the Moon Drip has occurred on this island every night for those past three years.
You should have been able to see the light falling on the ruins every day.
Kya!
The pitfall was also resurrected!
She just said Kya!
That was really cute.
This is not my fault!
This is not my fault!
Therefore, was it not the most suspicious place on this island?
She is acting like nothing happened.
She is tough...
I do not understand why you never investigated.
It is tradition in this village never to go near those ruins.
But this is no time to be bound by traditions.
You have had victims, and just look at the amount of the reward for the guild...
Will you please tell us the truth?
W-We do not really understand ourselves.
In truth we have tried to investigate those ruins many times.
We never use weapons, but we took them up, I trimmed my sideburns perfectly,
and we all headed toward those ruins...
But we could not get near.
As we walked toward the ruins, before we knew it we were back at the village gate!
We cannot come close to those ruins!
What does it mean?
You cannot get near them?
We all went inside them, no problem.
We did not tell you because we thought you would not believe us.
But it is the truth.
Now matter how many times we tried to go there...
I thought so.
As expected from Titania.
She is already figured out the trick.
Natsu.
Come with me.
We are going to destroy the moon!
Merry-go-round
I greet the morning,
chasing after your profile left only in my revolving dreams
You said, I never want to see your face again, when you left me
But the tears on your cheek said it all
Every time you felt like you would be swallowed up in the waves of contradiction
you always held back your tears, you know?
What a strong person, they said, but everyone overestimated you
and before you knew it you lost sight of who you really are
Then the sun I thought would always be near me collapsed
and the light shut off...
Rubbing out the truths and the lies of one day, altogether
Merry-go-round
I greet the morning,
still, ironically, chasing after your profile in my revolving dreams
Professor Happy's Fairy Tail Lectures!
Today we are going to tell you the secrets behind Celestial Spirit Wizards!
Celestial Spirits can be called by the wizard as many times as their mutual trust permits.
And they say the stronger the wizard's magical power, the stronger the Celestial Spirits become!
Please look forward to new Celestial Spirits showing up!
Until next time!
Stand, Bow, Aye!
Natsu, did you know that there are cats in the moon?
Wait, if you are talking about the moon, you mean rabbits, right?
No...
There is no way that rabbits would be so far away.
And there is no grass or anything.
I do not think there are any fish on the moon either, you know.
Next time: Reach it!
To that Sky!
Then what do the moon cats eat?
I am sayin' there are not no cats!
Aww...
I wanted to try eating a moon fish...
